i love watching sitcoms on television.
i like to play soccer , draw and read asterix.

participant_2.background:
I'm not really into hobbies, but I love to play board games with my family.
My parents have always been there for me and supported my dreams.
I make my living as a professional bowler.
I started my own business and now I'm a lot happier.
I do my laundry once a week, because that is enough to keep my clothes clean and fresh.

content.text: Hey! How's it going?
Hi there! Doing well, thanks for asking!
What are you up to today?
Just got back from the bowling alley, played a few games with some friends!
Oh that's cool! I used to bowl competitively, but I've fallen out of practice.
Yeah it's a lot of fun! You should come with us next time!
I think I would like that, thanks for the offer!
Any time! So what are your hobbies?
I love to play soccer, draw, and read. I also like to watch sitcoms on television.
That's great! I'm not really into hobbies, but I love to play board games with my family.
Oh that's fun! What are your favorite board games?
I like to play Monopoly, Scrabble, and Clue.
Oh I love Monopoly! It's so much fun to try to bankrupt your friends and family!
Right?! It's such a classic game.
It really is! What do you do for work?
I'm a professional bowler.
Oh that's awesome! I've always wanted to be a professional bowler.
It's a lot of fun! I get to travel all over the country and compete in tournaments.
That sounds amazing! I would love to do that.
You should give it a try! It's a lot of fun.
I think I might just do that!
Great! I'm sure you'd be great at it!
